Hi! This is Alice. I am studying data science at Brigham Young University-Idaho. I love story-telling, especially using data to find insights and solve problems. 

I am an aspiring data analyst. I specialize in using SQL for data extraction, R for data wrangling and data visualization, Excel for data anaysis, and PowerBI and Tableau for buidling dashoboards and report.
